item.name: EXNG: Active Connection Count
item.description: Number of connections that have shown some activity in the last 10 minutes.

item.name: EXNG: Active User Count
item.description: Number of user connections that have shown some activity in the last 10 minutes.

item.name: EXNG: Aggregate Delivery Queue Length
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)]
item.description: Shows the number of messages queued for delivery in all queues.

item.name: EXNG: Average Bytes/message
item.description: Shows the average number of message bytes per inbound message received. Determines sizes of messages being received for an SMTP receive connector.

item.name: EXNG: Average Delivery Time
item.description: The average time in milliseconds between the submission of a message to the mailbox store and submission to other storage providers for the last 10 messages.

item.name: EXNG: Events in Assistant's Queue
item.description: The number of events currently in the in-memory queue that are waiting to be processed by the assistants.

item.name: EXNG: IMAP4 Port Availability
item.description: Test the availability of IMAP4 on TCP port 143.

item.name: EXNG: Items Queued For Delivery/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Items Queued for Delivery Per Second]
item.description: The rate messages are queued for delivery since the server was started per second. The value format is a decimal.

item.name: EXNG: LDAP Searches/sec
item.description: The total LDAP searches per second since the server was started.

item.name: EXNG: Maximum Connections
item.description: The maximum number of concurrent connections since server startup.

item.name: EXNG: Maximum Users
item.description: The maximum number of concurrent users since server startup.

item.name: EXNG: Memory Pages/sec
item.description: Pages/sec is the rate at which pages are read from or written to disk to resolve hard page faults.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Completed Delivery/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Messages Completed Delivery Per Second]
item.description: Shows the number of messages delivered per second. Determines current load.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Delivered/sec
item.description: Shows the rate that messages are delivered to all recipients. Indicates current message delivery rate to the store.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Queued For Delivery/sec
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Messages Queued for Delivery Per Second]
item.description: The rate messages are queued for delivery since the server was started per second.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Queued For Submission
item.description: Shows the current number of submitted messages not yet processed by the transport layer. This may indicate connectivity issues to the transport server.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Received/sec
item.description: Shows the number of messages received by the SMTP server each second. Determines current load.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Sent by SMTP/sec
item.description: Shows the number of messages sent by the SMTP send connector each second. Determines current load.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Sent to Transport/sec
item.description: Used to determine current messages sent to transport.

item.name: EXNG: Messages Submitted Per Second
item.description: Shows the number of messages queued in the Submission queue per second.

item.name: EXNG: Number IMAP4 Connections
item.description: Number of active connections (in TIME_WAIT and ESTABLISHED state) to IMAP port.

item.name: EXNG: Number POP3 Connections
item.description: Number of active connections (in TIME_WAIT and ESTABLISHED state) to POP3 port.

item.name: EXNG: Outbound Submitted Mail Items
item.key: perf_counter[\MSExchange Store Driver\Outbound: Submitted Mail Items]

item.name: EXNG: Page File Usage
item.description: The % Usage Peak counter indicates how much of the paging file is being used.

item.name: EXNG: POP3 Port Availability
item.description: Test the availability of POP3 on TCP port 110.

item.name: EXNG: Service State - Mail Transfer Agent (MTA)
EXNG: Service State - Network News Transfer Protocol (NNTP)
EXNG: Service State - Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP)
EXNG: Service State - Site Replication Service
EXNG: SMTP Port Availability
item.description: Test the availability of SMTP on TCP port 25.

item.name: EXNG: Sync Commands/sec
item.description: Shows the number of Sync commands that are processed per second. Clients use this command to synchronize items within a folder. Stats Only to determine current user load.

item.name: EXNG: Total Number of Messages Received
item.description: The total number of inbound messages accepted since the server was started.

trigger.expression: {Template App Microsoft Exchange:perf_counter[\MSExchangeIS Mailbox(_Total)\Messages Queued For Submission].min(#2)}>50
trigger.name: EXNG: More than 50 messages not yet processed

trigger.expression: {Template App Microsoft Exchange:perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Messages Completed Delivery Per Second].min(#2)}>100
trigger.name: EXNG: More than 100 messages delivered per second
EXNG: More than 100 messages sent per second

trigger.expression: {Template App Microsoft Exchange:perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Messages Submitted Per Second].min(#2)}>100
trigger.name: EXNG: More than 100 messages submitted per second

trigger.expression: {Template App Microsoft Exchange:perf_counter[\MSExchangeTransport Queues(_total)\Aggregate Delivery Queue Length (All Queues)].min(#2)}>500
trigger.name: EXNG: More than 500 messages in all Queues
EXNG: More than 500 messages received per second
EXNG: Page File Usage is high
EXNG: Service State - Network News Transfer Protocol (NNTP)
EXNG: Service State - Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP)
EXNG: Service State - Site Replication Service
